nodes.text: Corellian ale was a popular alcoholic beverage brewed on Corellia. It also came in a spiced variety.
Corellian ale had a sweet flavor and medium weight body. It was possibly the most common alcholic beverage in the galaxy.
Kyle Katarn was one of many who would drink Corellian ale (though he would insist that it be served in a clean glass).
Wedge Antilles and Wes Janson shared a mutual appreciation for the drink, which contributed to their becoming close friends while members of Rogue Squadron.
Cade Skywalker ordered a "Corellian" at Rik's Cantina. When asked to specify ale or Corellian whiskey, he requested both. Jool then put the tab on the house.
In the first-edition WEG Star Wars Sourcebook, Corellian ale was described as being purple in color.
This drink was also known as 'Juri juice' in the PlayStation game Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace.

Corellian ale appeared in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. In the game, Corellian ale could be purchased from bartenders in cantinas around the galaxy. It should be noted that the same graphical model for Corellian ale was used for other items in the game.
